alert.note: Alert for Gillespie; Kerr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:52PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Kerr and southwestern Gillespie Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mountain Home, or 12 miles northwest of Kerrville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harper and Tivydale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
